titles: Obiections: answered by way of dialogue wherein is proved by the Law of God: by the law of our land: and by his Maties many testimonies that no man ought to be persecuted for his religion, so he testifie his allegeance by the Oath, appointed by law.
author: Helwys, Thomas, 1550?-1616?, attributed name. aut
Murton, John, attributed name. aut
notes: Variously attributed to Thomas Helwys and to John Murton.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Oath of allegiance, 1606 --  Early works to 1800.
Freedom of religion --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
